name: The Endless Days of Sodom Featuring Hatsune Miku
name_original: The Endless Days of Sodom Featuring Hatsune Miku
description: The 120 Days of Sodom, the Marquis de Sade's encyclopedia of perversion, consists of a frame story that contains six hundred "passions," or brief narratives told to a group of libertines by storytellers during their four-month long orgy at the remote chateau de Silling. The Endless Days of Sodom Featuring Hatsune Miku takes these micro-narratives and uses their sentence structures and vocabulary to pseudorandomly generate a nearly infinite number of potential Sadean passions. These passions are then narrated to the listener by the world-famous Vocaloid pop star Hatsune Miku, whose voice is a database of microtemporal vocal samples and whose image has been collectively constructed and reimagined by the creative output of legions of fans from around the world.
